abstract: Target names Anne Dament to help revamp the chain’s food business.
lead_paragraph: Target has named Anne Dament, a 20-year grocery and consumer product industry veteran, to help revamp the chain’s food business.

headline.main: Target Names Industry Veteran to Revamp Its Grocery Unit
headline.print_headline: Target Names Industry Veteran to Revamp Its Grocery Unit

snippet: Target has named Anne Dament, a 20-year grocery and consumer product industry veteran, to help revamp the chain’s food business.
